protein.specific_function: Stimulates GTP hydrolysis of members of the Rho family. Its action on RHOA activity and signaling is implicated in growth and stabilization of dendritic spines, and therefore in synaptic function. Critical for the stabilization of AMPA receptors at post-synaptic sites. Critical for the regulation of synaptic vesicle endocytosis at pre-synaptic terminals

Nature. 1998 Apr 30;392(6679):923-6.
